channel.title: Get the runescape download here! construction added! soz 4 wrong section
channel.description:
as the wrong title says, there aint a latest runescape version for all those beginners don't ask and spam this forum just to ask for a so said "runescape 2006 " if you don't like private servers the way it is now then stop editing and play normal rs if you do like private servers continue editing, BUT DONT SPAM THIS FORUM FOR CRIES SAKE also, the latest forums have more sections, these: - server development/help - server development tuts - server downloads (now i'm only talking about rs2 server development, not rsc)
-for all those ppl who want to ask something put that in [size=15pt]server development/help[/size]
-for all those ppl who want to development something (with toturials) put that in [size=15pt]server development tuts[/size]
-for all those ppl who want to put there server/client for public download put that in [size=15pt]server downloads[/size]
do not ask something in server downloads if it needs to be in server development/help !
this is all i have to say, i think some ppl think " wtf, so stupid" and continue spamming but i also think some ppl would see this is better. i also suggest if something is putten in the wrong section, to not answering it.
my second point. ppl who are new, read the rules, don't be lazy and if you are to lazy to read it then i say two rules that have been broken a few times: 1. buying aint allowed on the forums 2. selling aint allowed on the forums
i hope this post would give these boards less spam messages. i greed yall.

item.title: Get the runescape download here! construction added! soz 4 wrong section
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

hehe, i can defeat pikachu and charizard
with hamon, lord of striking thunder
mwuhahahaha,
ahum now lets get back to the point

do not make stupid names alike blabla, aaa, bbb, …etc.
couse this way nobody might help
also:
do not say something alike: as the title says, help!
or, send me the code, i pay a lot!
couse buying aint alllowed[br][size=1]Posted at: July 23, 2006, 08:54:48 AM[/size][hr]and there are still some bloody tuuts who think
by just putting it in the title that people know
what they are talking about,
those are lazy people
so i suggest that people don’t answer that
or just say something stupid and unhelpless.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Kryptizzler wrote:

[quote=“cawagula, post:2, topic:5537”][quote author=AD LVL 7 link=topic=7334.msg75245#msg75245 date=1153402838]

then i say two rules that have been broken a few times:

  1. buying aint allowed on the forums
  2. selling aint allowed on the forums
    [/quote]

Awww man, I wanted to sell my ubber rare pikachu card too! LMAO, jkz, jkz. Good job mate, maybe this will help cut down on the “Selling the best source!” threads -.-[/quote]

Pikachu’s not exactly that rare… however, if you have a Charizard I have like $50 on PayPal.
